title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, create, and run large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; install via pip and chat with local models in a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, RAG, and tool use.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that plugs into your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models (macOS/Windows/Linux).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI with batch prompts, conversation history, and model metrics.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code chat sidebar extension that uses your local Ollama server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for local Q&A over PDFs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Proof-of-concept multi-agent framework that spins up specialized Ollama model agents.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats and generates images using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private local LLM queries.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that connects to Ollama with session memory and model picker.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JS/TS bindings for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python developers to interact with Ollama servers.

title: Ollama Reddit Community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama projects.
